articles.author: Amanda Goh
articles.title: SF's Pink Painted Lady is listed for $3.55 million — but needs work
articles.description: "I expect whoever purchases it would renovate, so I thought it would be good to list it at the price that I bought it for," the owner told Insider.

articles.author: Tom Dotan, Nancy Luna
articles.title: Uber charging higher prices in major metro area due to high gas prices
articles.description: Surging gas prices have cut into the earnings of gig economy drivers, hammering the shares of Uber and rivals.
articles.content:
Uber is raising the price of rides in one major US city to help drivers deal with skyrocketing gas prices, according to a leaked memo.
The pay increase for ride-share drivers, confirmed by an Uber s… [+2215 chars]

articles.title: Texas summer camp shooter couldn't own gun, but stole wife's
articles.description: The shooter's wife says he took her gun from a locked safe, highlighting the difficulties of keeping firearms away from those who shouldn't have them.

articles.author: Alcynna Lloyd
articles.title: Housing crisis: Investor demand slows as mortgage rates surpass 6%
articles.description: Americans who don't already own a home are about to fork out more for a mortgage, and even renters will suffer as demand for leases goes up.
articles.content: The average U.S. fixed interest rate for a 30-year mortgage rose above 6% this week. It's more than double the 2.98% borrowers were offered during the same time period in 2021. Spurred on by the Fede… [+3785 chars]

articles.title: Elon Musk says self-driving tech will make or break the value of Tesla
articles.description: Elon Musk has been promising to develop self-driving cars since 2015, when he first predicted the tech would be ready in three years.
articles.content:
Tesla founder Elon Musk said the key to his electric automaker's value is whether it can achieve self-driving technology, adding that the firm would be "worth basically zero" without it.
